title: PaymentRequest
description: dApp's request to perform a payment via InstantPay.

amount.description: Payment amount as a decimal string with up to 18 fractional digits.

invoiceId.description: Unique payment identifier provided by the dApp.

asset.description: Asset to transfer (TON or specific Jetton).

adnlAddress.description: Optional ADNL address used for network-level features.

expiresAt.description: Optional UNIX timestamp (seconds) after which the request expires.
